triggered_effect.message: XP gained during the last level:

effect_group.name: check conditions for a successful track
check conditions for no trackable animals
Tracking time ran out or no targets
a chance to nope out of Grab that is based on Stamina

buff.name: buffStatusHungry01
buff.description_key: You are starting to get hungry

buff.name: buffStatusHungry02
buff.description_key: You are starting to get very hungry, get to hungry and you will start to lose Health

buff.name: buffStatusThirsty01
buff.description_key: You are starting to get thirsty

buff.name: buffStatusThirsty02
buff.description_key: You are very thirsty, get too thirsty and you will lose 1 Health every 5 sec

buff.name: jz_BuffGoodDiet
buff.description_key: Because your eating a more balanced diet you gain these benefits\n-Able to gain Health from food

buff.name: jz_BuffBalancedDiet
buff.description_key:
Because your eating a balanced diet you gain these benefits
-Able to gain Wellness from food
-Able to gain Health from food
-+1 Stamina Per 3 seconds

buff.name: jz_BuffHealthyDiet
buff.description_key:
Because your eating a very balanced diet you gain these benefits
-+20% Movement Speed
-Able to gain Wellness from food
-Able to gain Health from food
-+2 Stamina Per 3 seconds
-Naturally healing when full

buff.name: jz_BuffBadDiet
buff.description_key: Your diet is not very healthy and it is starting to effect you. Try eating foods that contains all the vitamin groups

buff.name: jz_BuffVitaminDeficiency
buff.description_key: Your poor diet means your not getting all the vitamins you need and its slowing you down. Cook and eat fresh meals that contains all the vitamin groups to improve your diet.

buff.name: jz_BuffMalnourished
buff.description_key: Your health is failing. You must eat a more balanced diet that contains all the vitamin groups in order to have a healthy diet. Try making and eating meals from a food prep table.

effect_group.name: Scratch Count Fader and Buff Remover

buff.name: jz_BuffBruised
buff.tooltip_key: Thats going to leave a bruise
buff.description_key: You're getting bruised up. The bruises will heal by themselves over time but you might want to be more careful.

buff.name: jz_BuffSmallWound
buff.description_key:
You've gotten a small wound. Treat it with a bandage and be sure to change it when it gets dirty.
-4 Stamina every 5 sec
-1 Health every 25 sec
-7% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffTendingOne
buff.description_key: Your wound is bandaged and healing. Make sure to change it when it gets dirty so it does not get infected.

buff.name: jz_BuffDirtyBandageOne
buff.description_key: Your bandage is dirty and starting to smell. Change it with another Bandage soon or your wound could get worse

buff.name: jz_BuffTendingTwo
buff.description_key: Your wound is bandaged and healing. Try not to get hurt so it will heal.

buff.name: jz_BuffThrobbingPain
buff.description_key: The wound hurts take some Painkillers for the pain\n-1 Stamina every 5 sec\n+10 Core Temp

buff.name: jz_BuffWound
buff.description_key:
You've gotten a wound. Treat it with a First Aid Bandage and be sure to change it when it gets dirty.
-1 Stamina every 1 sec
-1 Health every 15 sec
-9% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffTendingThree
buff.description_key: Your wound is bandaged and healing. Make sure to change it when it gets dirty so it does not get infected.

buff.name: jz_BuffDirtyBandageTwo
buff.description_key: Your bandage is dirty and starting to smell. Change it with another First Aid Bandage soon or your wound could get worst

buff.name: jz_BuffTendingFour
buff.description_key: Your wound is bandaged and healing. Try not to get hurt so it will heal.

buff.name: jz_BuffSevereWound
buff.tooltip_key: You have gotten a severe wound
buff.description_key:
You've gotten a sever wound. Treat it with Sanitized Bandage and be sure to change it when it gets dirty.
-12 Stamina every 10 sec
-1 Health every 10sec
-12% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffTendingFive
buff.description_key: Your wound is bandaged and healing. Make sure to change it when it gets dirty so it does not get infected.

buff.name: jz_BuffDirtyBandageThree
buff.description_key: Your bandage is dirty and starting to smell. Change it with another Sanitizing Bandage soon or your wound could get worst

buff.name: jz_BuffTendingSix
buff.description_key: Your wound is bandaged and healing. Try not to get hurt so it will heal.

buff.name: jz_BuffInfectedWound
buff.description_key:
Your wound has gotten infected. Treat it with First Aid Kit and be sure to change it when it gets dirty or you could die.
-3 Stamina every 1 sec
-1 Health every 10 sec
-15% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffTendingSeven
buff.description_key: Your wound is bandaged and healing. Make sure to change it when it gets dirty so it does not get infected.

buff.name: jz_BuffDirtyBandageFour
buff.description_key: Your bandage is dirty and starting to smell. Change it with another First Aid Kit soon or you could die

buff.name: jz_BuffTendingEight
buff.description_key: Your wound is bandaged and healing. Try not to get hurt so it will heal.

buff.name: jz_BuffBurnWound
buff.description_key: Your wound is bandaged and healing. Make sure to change it when it gets dirty so it does not get infected.

buff.name: jz_BuffSnakeBite
buff.description_key: A snake bit and poisoned you. You will need to find or make some Anti-Venom or you will get very ill. Anti-Venom can be crafted on the Campfire with a Venom Gland from a poisonous animal.

buff.name: jz_BuffSnakeBiteLvTwo
buff.tooltip_key: That Bite does not look good!
buff.description_key: Your snake bite is getting worse and the venom is spreading. You need to get some AntiVenom soon. Anti-Venom can be crafted on the Campfire with a Venom Gland from a poisonous animal.

buff.name: jz_BuffSnakeBiteLvThree
buff.description_key: The snake venom is coursing through your veins. If you can last the day you might just live. Or you can find or make some Anti-Venom .Anti-Venom can be crafted on the Campfire with a Venom Gland from a poisonous animal

buff.name: jz_BuffBadLeg
buff.description_key: Your old leg injury is acting up again. It will go away on its own but some ice would speed it up

buff.name: jz_BuffFoodStuffed
buff.description_key: You've eaten to much and are 30% slower

buff.name: jz_BuffFatigueZToClose
buff.description_key: Zombies are to close to you to get any rest, get away from them or kill them to recover here

buff.name: jz_BuffFurniturHardRecoverWorking
buff.description_key: You are resting on uncomfortable furniture. You are refilling your Fatigue Bar very slowly

buff.name: jz_BuffFurniturSoftRecoverWorking
buff.description_key: You are resting on comfortable furniture. You are refilling your Fatigue Bar slowly

buff.name: jz_BuffBedSmRecoverWorking
buff.description_key: You are recovering in a uncomfortable bed. You are refilling your Fatigue Bar and Healing very slowly

buff.name: jz_BuffBedMedRecoverWorking
buff.description_key: You are recovering in a comfortable bed. You are refilling your Fatigue Bar and Healing slowly

buff.name: jz_BuffBedLrgRecoverWorking
buff.description_key: You are recovering in a very comfortable bed. You are refilling your Fatigue Bar and Healing

buff.name: jz_BuffNaturalHealing
buff.description_key: You will natural heal while full with your HEalthy Diet Buff

effect_group.name: check conditions for a successful track
check conditions for no trackable animals
Tracking time ran out or no targets

buff.name: jz_BuffAcidSpit
buff.description_key:
That thing spit on you and its burning like acid. You should try washing it of with some liquid quickly
-1HP per 1sec
-1 Wellness
-1 Wellness if not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffStickySpit
buff.description_key: That thing spit on you and its all sticky you cant even move. Maybe some Acid would melt this stuff\n-1 Wellness\n-1 Wellness is not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffSmellySpit
buff.description_key: That thing spit on you and it stinks something horrible. It looks like the smell is attracting others\n-1 Wellness

buff.name: jz_BuffDeepCut
buff.description_key: Thats a Deep Cut it's going to need stitches to heal\n-5% Mobility\n-1HP per 30sec

buff.name: jz_BuffDeepCutStitched
buff.description_key: Should leave a nice scar but its going to need bandaging if you don't want it to get worse.\n-2% Mobility\n-1 Wellness if not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffGash
buff.description_key: You have a large Gash. You will need to use a Suture Kit to stitch it closed\n-8% Mobility\n-1HP per 20sec

buff.name: jz_BuffGashStitchedUp
buff.description_key: Should leave a nice scar but its going to need bandaging if you don't want it to get worse.\n-4% Mobility\n-1 Wellness if not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffGashBandaged
buff.description_key: Your Gash is bandaged up and healing. It will need to be changed when it gets dirty\n-2% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffGashDirtyBandaged
buff.description_key: Your bandage has gotten dirty and needs changing. If you don't do it soon it will get worse\n-3% Mobility\n-1 Wellness if not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffPunctured
buff.description_key:
You have a deep Puncture Wound. Your going to need to sanitize and pack the hole with a bandage
-10% Mobility
-1HP per 20sec
-1 Wellness

buff.name: jz_BuffPunctureBandagedSani
buff.description_key: Your Puncture Wound is healing well but it will need at lest a Medical Bandage to continue healing after this bandage gets dirty\n-5% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffDirtyPunctureBandagedA
buff.description_key: Your bandage has gotten dirty and needs to be changed. You will need at lest a Medical Bandage for it to continue healing\n-7% Mobility\n-1 Wellness if not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffPunctureBandageMedic
buff.description_key: Your Puncture Wound is healing well but it will need to be re bandaged to continue healing after this bandage gets dirty\n-2% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffDirtyPunctureBandagedB
buff.description_key: Your bandage has gotten dirty and needs to be changed. You will need to re bandaged it for it to continue healing\n-3% Mobility\n-1 Wellness if not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffPunctureBandage
buff.description_key: Your Puncture Wound is healing well but it will need to be re bandaged to continue healing after this bandage gets dirty\n-1% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffDirtyPunctureBandagedC
buff.description_key: Your bandage has gotten dirty and needs to be changed. You will need to re bandaged it for it to continue healing\n-2% Mobility\n-1 Wellness if not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffGored
buff.description_key: You have been gored. You will need to use a suture kit to stitch it closed\-15% Mobility\n-1HP per 20sec\n-2 Wellness

buff.name: jz_BuffGoredStitchedUp
buff.description_key: Should leave a nice scar but its going to need at lest a Sanitizing Bandaging if you don't want it to get worse.\n-8% Mobility\n-1 Wellness if not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffGoredBandageSani
buff.description_key: Your Gore Wound is healing well but it will need at lest a Medical Bandage to continue healing after this bandage gets dirty\n-4% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffGoredDirtyBandangeA
buff.description_key: Your bandage has gotten dirty and needs to be changed. You will need at lest a Medical Bandage for it to continue healing\n-6% Mobility\n-1 Wellness if not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffGoredBandageMedic
buff.description_key: Your Gore Wound is healing well but it will need to be re bandaged to continue healing after this bandage gets dirty\n-2% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffGoredDirtyBandangeB
buff.description_key: Your bandage has gotten dirty and needs to be changed. You will need to re bandaged it for it to continue healing\n-3% Mobility\n-1 Wellness if not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffGoredBandage
buff.description_key: Your Gore Wound is healing well but it will need to re bandaged to continue healing after this bandage gets dirty\n-1% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffGoredDirtyBandangeC
buff.description_key: Your bandage has gotten dirty and needs to be changed. You will need to re bandaged it for it to finish healing\n-2% Mobility\n-1 Wellness if not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffAnimalBite
buff.description_key:
That animal just took a bite out of you. Your going to need to cauterize the wound. A Hot Pipe should work
-5% Mobility
-1 Wellness
-1HP per 30sec

buff.name: jz_BuffAnimalBiteCauterized
buff.description_key:
The Animal bite has been dealt with but now you have to deal with this burn. Your going to need some aloe before this gets worse
-3% Mobility
-1 Stamina per 5sec
-1 Wellness if not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffAnimalBiteAloed
buff.description_key: Your Animal Bite is healing well but it will need at to be bandaged to continue healing after this bandage gets dirty\n-1% Mobility\n-1 Stamina per 10sec

-1 Wellness if not treated
